attributes.action: Call on Nicola Sturgeon & Scottish Parliament to block the UK's exit from the EU
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon Nicola Sturgeon and the Scottish Parliament to block the UK's exit from the EU this is this our only hope as a 2nd leave/remain vote for us - seems highly unlikely - lets unite with the Scottish people and try and keep our lovely Country together and in the EU .

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
